title: Splunk Log Analysis
description: Detected anomalies in system logs with dashboards.
objective: Practice log analysis with SIEM tools.
results: Detected suspicious login attempts from attacker IP.

challenges.problem: Some logs were not being ingested.
challenges.solution: Checked input configuration and adjusted source types.

challenges.problem: Dashboard panels did not display correct data.
challenges.solution: Verified queries and time ranges for consistency.
